Dear Jenny,

It started at a dive bar in Kissimmee. I don't know what I expected to find there, but it definitely wasn't the rest of my life. Yet here we are — married, two dogs deep, and I'd do it all over again in a heartbeat.

Happy Valentine's Day to the only person who can make me laugh until I can't breathe, and then insist with a straight face that she kissed me first.

(You didn't. But I love you for trying.)

Forever yours, Tyler ❤
